title: Learning Present Continuous Tense for Daily Conversations
narration: नमस्ते गृहिणियों आज हम प्रेजेंट कंटीन्यूअस टेंस सीखेंगे। Hello housewives Today we are going to learn the present continuous tense. यह टेंस हमें बताएगा कि घर पर हम अभी क्या कर रहे हैं  This tense will tell us what we are doing at home right now

title: What is Present Continuous Tense?
content:
Describes actions happening NOW.
Uses "is," "am," "are" + verb + "-ing".
Example: I am cooking.
image_desc: Woman cooking in kitchen. Type: stock photo
narration: प्रेजेंट कंटीन्यूअस टेंस का मतलब है कोई काम अभी चल रहा है। Present continuous tense means an action is happening right now. हम is am या are का इस्तेमाल करते हैं फिर क्रिया verb और उसके साथ ing लगाते हैं। We use is am or are then the verb and add ing to it. जैसे मैं खाना बना रही हूँ। For example I am cooking.

title: Using "Am"
content:
"Am" is used with "I".
Example: I am cleaning the house.
Example: I am watching TV.
image_desc: Woman cleaning house. Type: stock photo
narration: Am का इस्तेमाल हमेशा I के साथ होता है। Am is always used with I. जैसे मैं घर साफ़ कर रही हूँ। For example I am cleaning the house. या मैं टीवी देख रही हूँ। Or I am watching TV.

title: Using "Is"
content:
"Is" is used with "He," "She," "It," and singular nouns.
Example: She is washing clothes.
Example: He is reading a book.
image_desc: Woman washing clothes. Type: stock photo
narration: Is का इस्तेमाल He She It और एकवचन संज्ञा singular nouns के साथ होता है। Is is used with He She It and singular nouns. जैसे वह कपड़े धो रही है। For example She is washing clothes. या वह किताब पढ़ रहा है। Or He is reading a book.

title: Using "Are"
content:
"Are" is used with "You," "We," "They," and plural nouns.
Example: We are eating dinner.
Example: They are playing in the garden.
image_desc: Family eating dinner. Type: stock photo
narration: Are का इस्तेमाल You We They और बहुवचन संज्ञा plural nouns के साथ होता है। Are is used with You We They and plural nouns. जैसे हम रात का खाना खा रहे हैं। For example We are eating dinner. या वे बगीचे में खेल रहे हैं। Or They are playing in the garden.

title: Common Home Activities
content:
Cooking
Cleaning
Washing
Reading
Watching TV
image_desc: Collage of home activities. Type: photo collage
narration: यहां कुछ आम घरेलू गतिविधियां हैं जिनके बारे में हम बात कर सकते हैं। Here are some common home activities that we can talk about. जैसे खाना बनाना सफाई करना धोना पढ़ना और टीवी देखना। Like cooking cleaning washing reading and watching TV.

title: Practice Sentences - Cooking
content:
I am cooking rice.
She is making tea.
They are preparing dinner.
image_desc: Woman cooking rice. Type: stock photo
narration: चलिए कुछ वाक्य बनाते हैं खाना बनाने के बारे में। Let's make some sentences about cooking. मैं चावल बना रही हूँ। I am cooking rice. वह चाय बना रही है। She is making tea. वे रात का खाना तैयार कर रहे हैं। They are preparing dinner.

title: Practice Sentences - Cleaning
content:
He is cleaning the room.
I am sweeping the floor.
We are tidying up the house.
image_desc: Man cleaning room. Type: stock photo
narration: अब सफाई के बारे में कुछ वाक्य। Now some sentences about cleaning. वह कमरा साफ़ कर रहा है। He is cleaning the room. मैं फर्श पर झाड़ू लगा रही हूँ। I am sweeping the floor. हम घर को साफ़ सुथरा कर रहे हैं। We are tidying up the house.

title: Practice Sentences - Washing
content:
She is washing the dishes.
I am washing my clothes.
They are washing the car.
image_desc: Woman washing dishes. Type: stock photo
narration: अब धोने के बारे में। Now about washing. वह बर्तन धो रही है। She is washing the dishes. मैं अपने कपड़े धो रही हूँ। I am washing my clothes. वे कार धो रहे हैं। They are washing the car.

title: Practice Sentences - Reading
content:
He is reading a newspaper.
I am reading a book.
We are reading stories.
image_desc: Man reading newspaper. Type: stock photo
narration: अब पढ़ने के बारे में। Now about reading. वह अखबार पढ़ रहा है। He is reading a newspaper. मैं किताब पढ़ रही हूँ। I am reading a book. हम कहानियाँ पढ़ रहे हैं। We are reading stories.

title: Practice Sentences - Watching TV
content:
She is watching a movie.
I am watching the news.
They are watching a cartoon.
image_desc: Woman watching movie. Type: stock photo
narration: अब टीवी देखने के बारे में। Now about watching TV. वह फिल्म देख रही है। She is watching a movie. मैं समाचार देख रही हूँ। I am watching the news. वे कार्टून देख रहे हैं। They are watching a cartoon.

title: Keep Practicing!
content: Practice using present continuous tense in your daily conversations!
image_desc: Group of women talking. Type: stock photo
narration: प्रेजेंट कंटीन्यूअस टेंस का अभ्यास करते रहें Keep practicing the present continuous tense रोजमर्रा की बातचीत में इसका इस्तेमाल करें। Use it in your daily conversations. धन्यवाद Thank you
